s.text: For those of you who are sticklers when it comes to showbiz bureaucracy, the NYT has just the correction for you: "Because of an editing error, an article on July 27 about the apartment of Jen Graffam-Wink and Chris Wink, a founder of the Blue Man Group, referred incorrectly to the group's structure.
The stockpile plan was developed, says the paper, without consulting drug industry leaders about feasibility, and by a group including two men standing to gain financially from the set-up.
The paper says that the vote puts new pressure on hostile Senate Republicans to approve the bill.
